SELECT ad.name AS dimensionName, COALESCE(AVG(aa.score), 0) AS avgScore, COALESCE(MAX(aa.max_score), 100) AS maxScore FROM ability_assessments aa JOIN ability_dimensions ad ON aa.dimension_id = ad.id LEFT JOIN assignments a ON aa.related_id = a.id
JOIN enrollments e ON e.student_id = aa.student_id AND e.course_id = a.course_id
WHERE 1=1 AND a.course_id = #{courseId} AND e.status = 'active'
AND aa.assessed_at BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
GROUP BY ad.name

SELECT COALESCE(AVG(g.score), 0) AS avgScore, COALESCE(MAX(g.max_score), 100) AS maxScore FROM grades g JOIN assignments a ON g.assignment_id = a.id
JOIN enrollments e ON e.student_id = g.student_id AND e.course_id = a.course_id
WHERE 1=1 AND a.course_id = #{courseId} AND g.student_id = #{studentId} AND (e.status = 'active' OR e.status = 1) AND g.created_at BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} AND (g.deleted = false OR g.deleted = 0) AND (g.status = 'published' OR g.status = 'PUBLISHED' OR g.status = 1)
SELECT dimension_code AS dimensionCode, weight AS weight, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM course_ability_weights WHERE course_id = #{courseId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO course_ability_weights (course_id, dimension_code, weight, updated_at) VALUES (#{courseId}, #{dimensionCode}, #{weight}, NOW()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE weight = VALUES(weight), updated_at = NOW()
